subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which monument in Jaipur is known as the 'Pink City'?
question_hi: जयपुर में कौन सा मंदिर 'कपूर' कहा जाता है।
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal is popularly known as the 'Pink City' in Jaipur due to its pink-colored exterior. It is a beautiful palace built in the Indo-Saracenic style.
